alert.note: Alert for Union (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 12 at 10:43PM CDT until April 12 at 11:30PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Union County in south central Arkansas... Southeastern Webster Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Western Union Parish in north central Louisiana... West central Ouachita Parish in north central Louisiana... Claiborne Parish in northwestern Louisiana... North central Bienville Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Lincoln Parish in north central Louisiana... * Until 1130 PM CDT. * At 1043 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Emerson to 15 miles south of Gibsland, moving east at 75 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Ruston, Grambling, Homer, Junction City, Farmerville, Arcadia, Haynesville, Bernice, Gibsland, Cooley, Dubach, Simsboro, Vienna, Athens, Lisbon, Downsville, Spearsville, Lillie, Bryceland and Mount Lebanon. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for south central Arkansas...and north central and northwestern Louisiana. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for south central Arkansas...and north central and northwestern Louisiana.
